mapper.select: select x.* from (select rownum as rnum,before_ord.* from (select * from member order by name) before_ord where rownum < #{endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{startnum} order by x.name
select user_id,name,phone,email,m_level,re_level from member where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set phone = #{phone}, m_level = #{m_level}, name = #{name} where user_id = #{user_id}
update MEMBER set re_level = #{re_level} where user_id = #{user_id}
